summary: Small add-on that gives a 50% chance for all the beggars in Skyrim to have the Beggar's Sack Backpack by Ailouros. Requires the original mod.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Description[/size]
Small add-on that gives a 50% chance for all the beggars in Skyrim to have the Beggar's Sack Backpack by Ailouros. Requires the original mod.

[size=4]Requirement[/size]
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60242/?][color=#1e84cc]Beggar's Sack Backpack[/color] [color=#999999]by [b]Ailouros[/b][/color]
[/url]
[/size][size=4]Compatibility
[/size]This mod is clean and compatible with pretty much everything, you can run [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1840/?]Wrye Bash[/url] [/b]to make it fully compatible with any other mods.

[size=4]Installation
[/size]Simply download with NMM or Mod organizer, or if you prefer you can manually download it.

[size=4]Uninstallation
[/size]Simply use NMM or Mod organizer, or delete sackbagLeveledlist.esp

[size=4]Credit
[/size]All credits go to Bethesda and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60242/?][b]Ailouros[/b][/url]
author: JeeNiNe
